title: DJ Q-Bert Skratching Vol.1.toast
description:
DJ Q-Bert_Skatching_Vol.1 

8 GIG DVD - .toast (Mac Image File)

Get the demo TransMac http://www.asy.com/scrtm.htm to open image on P.C. (May need to change extension).

DVD Contents -

The clearest, best illustrated, most comprehensive DVD on skratching and home improvement! Featuring Multiple Video Angles. See every skratch from 4 camera angles! All clips loopÃ¢â‚¬â€you decide when to go on. All lessons taught by QBert. Multiple Audio Tracks. Mixed Audio on track 1, Skratches Only on track 2, and Beats Only on track 3. Pick the track that's right for you.Ã‚Â 

 Also features Over 25 Skratches at all skill levels. Includes: Babies, Marches, Drags, Chirps, Crabs, Lazers, Waves, Needle Dropping, Flares, and more!Ã‚Â  Practice Your New Skills in a Q &amp; A battle session with Spy-D, The Deck Demon, Lamb Chop, and more. Each battle becomes progressivly more difficult and uses the skratches you've just learned. Tips and Secrets Section. Step-by-step video shows you how to setup your gear, from balancing your tone arm to skip prevention techniques. Learn how to fix a leaky pipe, count bars or make an emergency slip mat.Ã‚Â
